TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_maydih_minanam_tu_lalangawan_nu_zuma_a_niyazu', title = maydih_minanam_tu_lalangawan_nu_zuma_a_niyazu', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/maydih_minanam_tu_lalangawan_nu_zuma_a_niyazu'} }

S.FORM: maydih minanam tu lalangawan nu zuma a niyazu',nalimaan,tineng maluk atu likec nu kasabinawlan,Sakizaya izaw ku sabeleng sananay miidanng a pinangan,u palabang hananay.niyazu'ay masakumi a tayza i zuma a niyazu'mizizaw miidang.katukuh i kakatukuhan a niyazu',kanca madademec tu itizaay a kapah tu icelang nu uzip,mapalaw atu mapapakungku.amahiza amilihiza tu kumung selal a kalas,kakelidan selal a mikeliday,atu layung nu kapah maaini,matatengil tu kawaw nu kasaniyazu'atu tineng,macacubelis,maaazih,masasinanam.caay henay kasiacawa a milihizaay miidang mizizaw,misamata miazih tu zumaay niyazu'tu maluacawa.

maydih minanam to lalangawan no zoma a niyazo',nalimaan,tineng malok ato likec no kasabinawlan,Sakizaya izaw ko sabeleng sananay miidanng a pinangan,o palabang hananay.niyazo'ay masakomi a tayza i zoma a niyazo'mizizaw miidang.katokoh i kakatokohan a niyazo',kanca madademec to itizaay a kapah to icelang no ozip,mapalaw ato mapapakongko.amahiza amilihiza to komong selal a kalas,kakelidan selal a mikeliday,ato layong no kapah maaini,matatengil to kawaw no kasaniyazo'ato tineng,macacobelis,maaazih,masasinanam.caay henay kasiacawa a milihizaay miidang mizizaw,misamata miazih to zomaay niyazo'to maloacawa.
